mapper.insert:
SELECT GET_MGRNU('GT_C111_P') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GT_C111_P ( MGRNU, DIRECTION, CSS_NAM, PE_NAM, GU_NAM, DONG_NAM, MINX, MINY, MAXX, MAXY, XCE, YCE, PE_CDE, GU_CDE, DONG_CDE, CSS_MGRNU, RI_NAM, RI_CDE, JIBUN, PNU, XGEO, ROUTE_ID, ROUTE_NUM, STATION_SEQ, STATION_ID, NAME, ROD_NAM, STRUCTURE, MNG_NAM, SUB_MNG_NAM, REG_YMD ) VALUES ( #{mgrnu}, #{direction}, #{cssNam}, #{peNam}, #{guNam}, #{dongNam}, #{minX}, #{minY}, #{maxX}, #{maxY}, #{xce}, #{yce}, #{peCde}, #{guCde}, #{dongCde}, #{cssMgrnu}, #{liNam}, #{liCde}, #{jibun}, #{pnu}, MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom}, 5181), #{routeId}, #{routeNum}, #{stationSeq}, #{stationId}, #{name}, #{rodNam}, #{structure}, #{mngNam}, #{subMngNam}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT MGRNU, '청주시' ||' '|| GU_NAM || ' ' || DONG_NAM || ' ' || RI_NAM || JIBUN AS ADDR, DIRECTION, TO_CODE('ALL','DIRECTION',DIRECTION) AS DIRECTION_NAM, CSS_NAM, PE_NAM, GU_NAM, DONG_NAM, MINX, MINY, MAXX, MAXY, XCE, YCE, PE_CDE, GU_CDE, DONG_CDE, CSS_MGRNU, RI_NAM, RI_CDE, JIBUN, PNU, XGEO, ROUTE_ID, ROUTE_NUM, STATION_SEQ, STATION_ID, NAME, ROD_NAM, STRUCTURE, MNG_NAM, SUB_MNG_NAM, REG_YMD, UPT_YMD FROM GT_C111_P WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.update: UPDATE GT_C111_P SET DIRECTION = #{direction}, ROUTE_ID = #{routeId}, ROUTE_NUM = #{routeNum}, STATION_SEQ = #{stationSeq}, STATION_ID = #{stationId}, NAME = #{name}, UPT_YMD = SYSDATE, CSS_NAM = #{cssNam}, PE_NAM = #{peNam}, GU_NAM = #{guNam}, DONG_NAM = #{dongNam}, PE_CDE = #{peCde}, GU_CDE = #{guCde}, DONG_CDE = #{dongCde}, CSS_MGRNU = #{cssMgrnu}, RI_NAM = #{liNam}, RI_CDE = #{liCde}, JIBUN = #{jibun}, PNU = #{pnu}, ROD_NAM = #{rodNam}, XCE = #{pointXce}, YCE = #{pointYce}, MAXX = #{maxX}, MAXY = #{maxY}, MINX = #{minX}, MINY = #{minY}, STRUCTURE = #{structure}, MNG_NAM = #{mngNam}, SUB_MNG_NAM = #{subMngNam}, XGEO = MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom},5181) WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, TEMP.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALROWS FROM ( SELECT MGRNU, MGRNU_IDX, WORK_CDE, TO_CODE('CHG_HISTORY','WORK_CDE',WORK_CDE) AS WORK_CDE_NAM, WORKTM, WORKUSER, WORK_BG FROM GT_C111_P_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu} AND WORK_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC ) TEMP ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC, MGRNU ASC) TEMP WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{rows} * ( #{page} - 1 ) + 1 AND #{rows}* #{page}

SELECT NVL(MAX(MGRNU_IDX), 0) +1 AS mgrnuIdx FROM GT_C111_P_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}

mapper.select: SELECT MGRNU, MGRNU_IDX, WORKUSER, WORKTM, WORK_CDE, TO_CODE('CHG_HISTORY','WORK_CDE',WORK_CDE) AS WORK_CDE_NAM, WORK_BG, WORK_REG_YMD, WORK_OP, WORK_ACTIVE, CHK_CITY FROM GT_C111_P_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu} AND WORK_ACTIVE = 1 AND MGRNU_IDX = #{mgrnuIdx}
